docs.lead_paragraph: Following is a transcript of President Bush's State of the Union Message tonight, as recorded by The New York Times. Thank you, Mr. Speaker, Mr. President. Mr. Speaker, Mr. President, distinguished members of Congress, honored guests and fellow citizens, thank you very much for that warm reception.

headline.main: Transcript of President Bush's Address on the State of the Union
